attributes.action:
Reinstate the current exemption of over 75’s from TV 
licence .
attributes.additional_details:
Self evident that the BBC’s recent decision to remove the TV licence
exemption is harmful to over 75s, and not only economically.
attributes.background:
Legislate to enshrine in law that the over 75’s are exempted  from
the BBC’s TV licence, from 1st August, 2020.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300425
